mc.name: Unbender Tine
mc.oracleText: {T}: Untap another target permanent.
mc.printedText: {T}: Untap another target permanent.
mc.flavorText: Creations made in madness may contain great power. The path to that power is as labyrinthine as the creator's mind.

mc.name: Retaliator Griffin
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever a source an opponent controls deals damage to you, you may put that many +1/+1 counters on Retaliator Griffin.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever a source an opponent controls deals damage to you, you may put that many +1/+1 counters on Retaliator Griffin.
mc.flavorText: For every eye, an eye. For every tooth, a tooth. Griffins are nothing if not fair.

mc.name: Sigiled Behemoth
mc.oracleText: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
mc.printedText: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
mc.flavorText:
"Do not mistake a behemoth's assistance for subservience."
--Mayael the Anima

mc.name: Mistvein Borderpost
mc.oracleText:
You may pay {1} and return a basic land you control to its owner's hand rather than pay Mistvein Borderpost's mana cost.
Mistvein Borderpost comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
You may pay {1} and return a basic land you control to its owner's hand rather than pay Mistvein Borderpost's mana cost.
Mistvein Borderpost comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

mc.name: Breath of Malfegor
mc.oracleText: Breath of Malfegor deals 5 damage to each opponent.
mc.printedText: Breath of Malfegor deals 5 damage to each opponent.
mc.flavorText: The blood of the demons quickened as their master rose over the battlefield. The blood of the angels also quickened: here was the chance to finally end the war started millennia ago.

mc.name: Trace of Abundance
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).
mc.printedText:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).

mc.name: Identity Crisis
mc.oracleText: Remove all cards in target player's hand and graveyard from the game.
mc.printedText: Remove all cards in target player's hand and graveyard from the game.
mc.flavorText:
"To join our ranks, one must be pure. To be pure, one must be blessed by etherium. To be blessed, one must forget oneself."
--Ethersworn prayer

mc.name: Reborn Hope
mc.oracleText: Return target multicolored card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: Return target multicolored card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText:
"In darkness is kindled the fiercest hope."
--Hadran, sunseeder of Naya

mc.name: Terminate
mc.oracleText: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
mc.flavorText:
"I've seen death before. My mother succumbing to illness, my comrades bleeding on the battlefield . . . But I'd never seen anything as dreadful as that."
--Taani, berserker of Etlan

mc.name: Lord of Extinction
mc.oracleText: Lord of Extinction's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in all graveyards.
mc.printedText: Lord of Extinction's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in all graveyards.
mc.flavorText: The forlorn cries of the dead combine to make its laugh.

mc.name: Blitz Hellion
mc.oracleText:
Trample, haste
At end of turn, Blitz Hellion's owner shuffles it into his or her library.
mc.printedText:
Trample, haste
At end of turn, Blitz Hellion's owner shuffles it into his or her library.
mc.flavorText: Alarans commemorated its appearances with new holidays bearing names like the Great Cataclysm and the Fall of Ilson Gate.

mc.name: Soulquake
mc.oracleText: Return all creatures in play and all creature cards in graveyards to their owners' hands.
mc.printedText: Return all creatures in play and all creature cards in graveyards to their owners' hands.
mc.flavorText: The Maelstrom sent a wave of raw mana through the battlefield, carrying off the fighting and fallen alike.

mc.name: Stormcaller's Boon
mc.oracleText:
Sacrifice Stormcaller's Boon: Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.
Cascade (When you play this spell, remove cards from the top of your library from the game until you remove a nonland card that costs less. You may play it without paying its mana cost. Put the removed cards on the bottom in a random order.)
mc.printedText:
Sacrifice Stormcaller's Boon: Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.
Cascade (When you play this spell, remove cards from the top of your library from the game until you remove a nonland card that costs less. You may play it without paying its mana cost. Put the removed cards on the bottom in a random order.)

mc.name: Vithian Renegades
mc.oracleText: When Vithian Renegades comes into play, destroy target artifact.
mc.printedText: When Vithian Renegades comes into play, destroy target artifact.
mc.flavorText: "Here is the proof that what has been done may yet be undone. The hope we thought dead will be gloriously reborn."

mc.name: Talon Trooper
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: "The volcanic winds make a maze of the skies of Jund. If we mean to invade, we must first learn their invisible paths."

mc.name: Anathemancer
mc.oracleText:
When Anathemancer comes into play, it deals damage to target player equal to the number of nonbasic lands that player controls.
Unearth {5}{B}{R} ({5}{B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to play. It gains haste. Remove it from the game at end of turn or if it would leave play. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

When Anathemancer comes into play, it deals damage to target player equal to the number of nonbasic lands that player controls.
Unearth {5}{B}{R} ({5}{B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to play. It gains haste. Remove it from the game at end of turn or if it would leave play. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

mc.name: Maelstrom Nexus
mc.oracleText: The first spell you play each turn has cascade. (When you play your first spell, remove cards from the top of your library from the game until you remove a nonland card that costs less. You may play it without paying its mana cost. Put the removed cards on the bottom in a random order.)
mc.printedText: The first spell you play each turn has cascade. (When you play your first spell, remove cards from the top of your library from the game until you remove a nonland card that costs less. You may play it without paying its mana cost. Put the removed cards on the bottom in a random order.)

mc.name: Ethercaste Knight
mc.oracleText: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
mc.printedText: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
mc.flavorText: "We coat ourselves in steel every day. What is etherium but the next logical step?"

mc.name: Deadshot Minotaur
mc.oracleText:
When Deadshot Minotaur comes into play, it deals 3 damage to target creature with flying.
Cycling {R/G} ({R/G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
When Deadshot Minotaur comes into play, it deals 3 damage to target creature with flying.
Cycling {RG} ({RG}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.flavorText: "May the earth rise up to meet you."

mc.name: Double Negative
mc.oracleText: Counter up to two target spells.
mc.printedText: Counter up to two target spells.
mc.flavorText: They feared each other for their differences but were absolutely terrified at their similarities.

mc.name: Behemoth Sledge
mc.oracleText:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink and trample.
Equip {3}
mc.printedText:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink and trample.
Equip {3}
mc.flavorText: Those who worship the great gargantuans could hardly be expected to fight with a subtle weapon.

mc.name: Meddling Mage
mc.oracleText:
As Meddling Mage comes into play, name a nonland card.
The named card can't be played.
mc.printedText:
As Meddling Mage comes into play, name a nonland card.
The named card can't be played.
mc.flavorText: "This violent wasteland is an indictment of its people. These cowards lack the will to oppose disorder."

mc.name: Mycoid Shepherd
mc.oracleText: Whenever Mycoid Shepherd or another creature you control with power 5 or greater is put into a graveyard from play, you may gain 5 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever Mycoid Shepherd or another creature you control with power 5 or greater is put into a graveyard from play, you may gain 5 life.
mc.flavorText: As pure mana flooded across the shards, it brought a sense of unity even to Jund's vicious food chain.

mc.name: Spellbreaker Behemoth
mc.oracleText:
Spellbreaker Behemoth can't be countered.
Creature spells you control with power 5 or greater can't be countered.
mc.printedText:
Spellbreaker Behemoth can't be countered.
Creature spells you control with power 5 or greater can't be countered.
mc.flavorText:
"Some think its immunity to countermagic evolved because of the constant mage attacks on Naya. I think it just ate a bunch of wizards."
--Broka, drumhunter

mc.name: Sangrite Backlash
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/-3.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/-3.
mc.flavorText:
"Sangrite is the dragon's beating heart. Little wonder, then, that so many fools' chests burst trying to contain it."
--Sarkhan Vol

mc.name: Lich Lord of Unx
mc.oracleText:
{U}{B}, {T}: Put a 1/1 blue and black Zombie Wizard creature token into play.
{U}{U}{B}{B}: Target player loses X life and puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of Zombies you control.

{U}{B}, {T}: Put a 1/1 blue and black Zombie Wizard creature token into play.
{U}{U}{B}{B}: Target player loses X life and puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of Zombies you control.

mc.name: Qasali Pridemage
mc.oracleText:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{1}, Sacrifice Qasali Pridemage: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
mc.printedText:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{1}, Sacrifice Qasali Pridemage: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
mc.flavorText: An elder in one pride, of the Sigiled caste in another.

mc.name: Sigil Captain
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature comes into play under your control, if that creature is 1/1, put two +1/+1 counters on it.
mc.printedText: Whenever a creature comes into play under your control, if that creature is 1/1, put two +1/+1 counters on it.
mc.flavorText: "One sigil awarded for valor, the other awarded for surviving Hellkite's Pass."

mc.name: Gorger Wurm
mc.oracleText: Devour 1 (As this comes into play, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature comes into play with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
mc.printedText: Devour 1 (As this comes into play, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature comes into play with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
mc.flavorText: In war-torn Alara, sometimes a wurm's gullet is the safest place to be.

mc.name: Fight to the Death
mc.oracleText: Destroy all blocking creatures and all blocked creatures.
mc.printedText: Destroy all blocking creatures and all blocked creatures.
mc.flavorText: When a battlefield falls silent, it's rarely due to a cease-fire.

mc.name: Mage Slayer
mc.oracleText:
Whenever equipped creature attacks, it deals damage equal to its power to defending player.
Equip {3}
mc.printedText:
Whenever equipped creature attacks, it deals damage equal to its power to defending player.
Equip {3}
mc.flavorText:
"When the wielder is strong enough, any sword will do."
--Kresh the Bloodbraided

mc.name: Intimidation Bolt
mc.oracleText: Intimidation Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature. Other creatures can't attack this turn.
mc.printedText: Intimidation Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature. Other creatures can't attack this turn.
mc.flavorText: For hours afterward, all they could see was the grisly silhouette of their master, screaming.

mc.name: Skyclaw Thrash
mc.oracleText: Whenever Skyclaw Thrash attacks, flip a coin. If you win the flip, Skyclaw Thrash gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever Skyclaw Thrash attacks, flip a coin. If you win the flip, Skyclaw Thrash gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Their newfound wings shined elegantly and functioned partially.

mc.name: Etherium Abomination
mc.oracleText: Unearth {1}{U}{B} ({1}{U}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to play. It gains haste. Remove it from the game at end of turn or if it would leave play. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
mc.printedText: Unearth {1}{U}{B} ({1}{U}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to play. It gains haste. Remove it from the game at end of turn or if it would leave play. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
mc.flavorText: It was given life by the etherium of a hundred slain Esperites.

mc.name: Singe-Mind Ogre
mc.oracleText: When Singe-Mind Ogre comes into play, target player reveals a card at random from his or her hand, then loses life equal to that card's converted mana cost.
mc.printedText: When Singe-Mind Ogre comes into play, target player reveals a card at random from his or her hand, then loses life equal to that card's converted mana cost.
mc.flavorText: Even the balmgivers of Bant couldn't heal the incurables, but sharing their torment helped.

mc.name: Zealous Persecution
mc.oracleText: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and creatures your opponents control get -1/-1.
mc.printedText: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and creatures your opponents control get -1/-1.
mc.flavorText:
"Jharic returned from Grixis changed, a haunted look in her eyes. She destroyed them with an unholy glee that made me shudder."
--Knight-Captain Wyhorn

mc.name: Glassdust Hulk
mc.oracleText:
Whenever another artifact comes into play under your control, Glassdust Hulk gets +1/+1 until end of turn and is unblockable this turn.
Cycling {W/U} ({W/U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Whenever another artifact comes into play under your control, Glassdust Hulk gets +1/+1 until end of turn and is unblockable this turn.
Cycling {WU} ({WU}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

mc.name: Ethersworn Shieldmage
mc.oracleText:
Flash
When Ethersworn Shieldmage comes into play, prevent all damage that would be dealt to artifact creatures this turn.
mc.printedText:
Flash
When Ethersworn Shieldmage comes into play, prevent all damage that would be dealt to artifact creatures this turn.
mc.flavorText: "See, children of metal? Already your bodies are rejecting harm. Continue on our path, and perfection will be yours."

mc.name: Nulltread Gargantuan
mc.oracleText: When Nulltread Gargantuan comes into play, put a creature you control on top of its owner's library.
mc.printedText: When Nulltread Gargantuan comes into play, put a creature you control on top of its owner's library.
mc.flavorText: It crushes all underfoot, yet leaves no trace of its passage--no trampled debris, no flattened souls, not even a hoofprint.

mc.name: Mask of Riddles
mc.oracleText:
Equipped creature has fear.
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
Equip {2}
mc.printedText:
Equipped creature has fear.
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
Equip {2}

mc.name: Marisi's Twinclaws
mc.oracleText: Double strike
mc.printedText: Double strike
mc.flavorText:
"Looks like we're completely outnumbered."
"Lucky for us. I thought we'd be bored."

mc.name: Drastic Revelation
mc.oracleText: Discard your hand. Draw seven cards, then discard three cards at random.
mc.printedText: Discard your hand. Draw seven cards, then discard three cards at random.
mc.flavorText: Every disaster holds mystery, for lack of a sane witness.

mc.name: Stun Sniper
mc.oracleText: {1}, {T}: Stun Sniper deals 1 damage to target creature. Tap that creature.
mc.printedText: {1}, {T}: Stun Sniper deals 1 damage to target creature. Tap that creature.
mc.flavorText: The tips of her bolts are blunt, but her aim is deadly sharp.

mc.oracleText:
You may pay {1} and return a basic land you control to its owner's hand rather than pay Wildfield Borderpost's mana cost.

mc.name: Magefire Wings
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has flying.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has flying.
mc.flavorText: Giving a thing wings does not take away its fear of flight--or its fear of fire, for that matter.

mc.name: Vectis Dominator
mc.oracleText: {T}: Tap target creature unless its controller pays 2 life.
mc.printedText: {T}: Tap target creature unless its controller pays 2 life.
mc.flavorText:
"I appreciate the artistry of the telemins, but the creatures of the other worlds provide a much more dramatic performance."
--Ennor, mentalist

mc.name: Sewn-Eye Drake
mc.oracleText: Flying, haste
mc.printedText: Flying, haste
mc.flavorText:
"Too wary to charge, too prudent to serve. Not anymore."
--Sedris, the Traitor King

mc.name: Illusory Demon
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When you play a spell, sacrifice Illusory Demon.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When you play a spell, sacrifice Illusory Demon.
mc.flavorText: In the Maelstrom, a trick of the light can feast on human flesh.

mc.name: Architects of Will
mc.oracleText:
When Architects of Will comes into play, look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order.
Cycling {U/B} ({U/B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
When Architects of Will comes into play, look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order.
Cycling {UB} ({UB}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.flavorText: This secret society of mages manipulates the beliefs and opinions of others.

mc.name: Giant Ambush Beetle
mc.oracleText:
Haste
When Giant Ambush Beetle comes into play, you may have target creature block it this turn if able.
mc.printedText:
Haste
When Giant Ambush Beetle comes into play, you may have target creature block it this turn if able.
mc.flavorText: It waits with absolute stillness. One might think it a statue if it weren't occasionally seen chewing on its victims.

mc.name: Mind Funeral
mc.oracleText: Target opponent reveals cards from the top of his or her library until four land cards are revealed. That player puts all cards revealed this way into his or her graveyard.
mc.printedText: Target opponent reveals cards from the top of his or her library until four land cards are revealed. That player puts all cards revealed this way into his or her graveyard.
mc.flavorText:
"The soul is only as eternal as I say it is."
--Sharuum the Hegemon

mc.name: Wall of Denial
mc.oracleText: Defender, flying, shroud
mc.printedText: Defender, flying, shroud
mc.flavorText: It provides what every discerning mage requires--time to think.

Flying

mc.name: Winged Coatl
mc.oracleText:
Flash
Flying
Deathtouch (Whenever this creature deals damage to a creature, destroy that creature.)
mc.printedText:
Flash
Flying
Deathtouch (Whenever this creature deals damage to a creature, destroy that creature.)
mc.flavorText: The nacatl called this new species "vetli," their word for poison arrows.

mc.name: Flurry of Wings
mc.oracleText: Put X 1/1 white Bird Soldier creature tokens with flying into play, where X is the number of attacking creatures.
mc.printedText: Put X 1/1 white Bird Soldier creature tokens with flying into play, where X is the number of attacking creatures.
mc.flavorText: "We are born soldiers. The call to battle is a homecoming."

mc.name: Brainbite
mc.oracleText:
Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: An Esper mage will leave a hole in your memory with surgical precision. A Grixis mage sees no reason to be so kind.

mc.name: Glory of Warfare
mc.oracleText:
As long as it's your turn, creatures you control get +2/+0.
As long as it's not your turn, creatures you control get +0/+2.
mc.printedText:
As long as it's your turn, creatures you control get +2/+0.
As long as it's not your turn, creatures you control get +0/+2.
mc.flavorText: "Their hopes dashed on our shields! Their victory slashed by our swords!"

mc.name: Putrid Leech
mc.oracleText: Pay 2 life: Putrid Leech gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Play this ability only once each turn.
mc.printedText: Pay 2 life: Putrid Leech gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Play this ability only once each turn.
mc.flavorText: It reacted to Naya's overabundant food supply by growing additional mouths.

mc.name: Morbid Bloom
mc.oracleText: Remove target creature card in a graveyard from the game, then put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens into play, where X is the removed card's toughness.
mc.printedText: Remove target creature card in a graveyard from the game, then put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens into play, where X is the removed card's toughness.
mc.flavorText:
"From the damned I make my garden."
--Jorshu of Clan Nel Toth

mc.name: Etherwrought Page
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one- You gain 2 life; or look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card into your graveyard; or each opponent loses 1 life.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one -- You gain 2 life; or look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card into your graveyard; or each opponent loses 1 life.
mc.flavorText: An unbound page is a riddle, free of cover and of context, a favorite token of the hegemon.

mc.name: Crystallization
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, remove that creature from the game.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, remove that creature from the game.

mc.name: Sanity Gnawers
mc.oracleText: When Sanity Gnawers comes into play, target player discards a card at random.
mc.printedText: When Sanity Gnawers comes into play, target player discards a card at random.
mc.flavorText: The last thought to go through their victim's mind is the one they tear out through the scalp.

mc.name: Colossal Might
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets +4/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets +4/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Never corner a barbarian. You become the path of least resistance."
--Sarkhan Vol

mc.name: Vengeful Rebirth
mc.oracleText:
Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. If you return a nonland card to your hand this way, Vengeful Rebirth deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to target creature or player.

Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. If you return a nonland card to your hand this way, Vengeful Rebirth deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to target creature or player.
Remove Vengeful Rebirth from the game.

mc.name: Sigil of the Nayan Gods
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control.
Cycling {G/W} ({G/W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control.
Cycling {GW} ({GW}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.flavorText: As the elves learned the hymns of angels, the knights learned the roars of titans.

mc.name: Lorescale Coatl
mc.oracleText: Whenever you draw a card, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Lorescale Coatl.
mc.printedText: Whenever you draw a card, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Lorescale Coatl.
mc.flavorText:
"The enlightenment I never found in etherium I have found traced in the coatl's scales."
--Ranalus, vedalken heretic

mc.name: Demonspine Whip
mc.oracleText:
{X}: Equipped creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
Equip {1}
mc.printedText:
{X}: Equipped creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
Equip {1}
mc.flavorText: Using a spine to break a slave's back appeals to the Grixis sense of irony.

mc.name: Karrthus, Tyrant of Jund
mc.oracleText:
Flying, haste
When Karrthus, Tyrant of Jund comes into play, gain control of all Dragons, then untap all Dragons.
Other Dragon creatures you control have haste.
mc.printedText:
Flying, haste
When Karrthus, Tyrant of Jund comes into play, gain control of all Dragons, then untap all Dragons.
Other Dragon creatures you control have haste.

mc.name: Wargate
mc.oracleText: Search your library for a permanent card with converted mana cost X or less, put it into play, then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Search your library for a permanent card with converted mana cost X or less, put it into play, then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: Bant mages still call to the heavens for aid, but angels are not the only ones who answer.

mc.name: Thraximundar
mc.oracleText:
Haste
Whenever Thraximundar attacks, defending player sacrifices a creature.
Whenever a player sacrifices a creature, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Thraximundar.
mc.printedText:
Haste
Whenever Thraximundar attacks, defending player sacrifices a creature.
Whenever a player sacrifices a creature, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Thraximundar.
mc.flavorText: His name means "he who paints the earth red."

mc.name: Thought Hemorrhage
mc.oracleText: Name a nonland card. Target player reveals his or her hand. Thought Hemorrhage deals 3 damage to that player for each card with that name revealed this way. Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with that name and remove them from the game. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
mc.printedText: Name a nonland card. Target player reveals his or her hand. Thought Hemorrhage deals 3 damage to that player for each card with that name revealed this way. Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with that name and remove them from the game. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

mc.name: Enigma Sphinx
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Enigma Sphinx is put into your graveyard from play, put it into your library third from the top.
Cascade (When you play this spell, remove cards from the top of your library from the game until you remove a nonland card that costs less. You may play it without paying its mana cost. Put the removed cards on the bottom in a random order.)
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Enigma Sphinx is put into your graveyard from play, put it into your library third from the top.
Cascade (When you play this spell, remove cards from the top of your library from the game until you remove a nonland card that costs less. You may play it without paying its mana cost. Put the removed cards on the bottom in a random order.)

mc.name: Sovereigns of Lost Alara
mc.oracleText:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, you may search your library for an Aura card that could enchant that creature, put it into play attached to that creature, then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, you may search your library for an Aura card that could enchant that creature, put it into play attached to that creature, then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Sages of the Anima
mc.oracleText: If you would draw a card, instead reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
mc.printedText: If you would draw a card, instead reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
mc.flavorText: Godtrackers found new pantheons of beast-gods beyond Naya's borders.

mc.name: Predatory Advantage
mc.oracleText: At the end of each opponent's turn, if that player didn't play a creature spell this turn, put a 2/2 green Lizard creature token into play.
mc.printedText: At the end of each opponent's turn, if that player didn't play a creature spell this turn, put a 2/2 green Lizard creature token into play.
mc.flavorText: Those who forget their past are doomed to be eaten by it.

mc.name: Cerodon Yearling
mc.oracleText: Vigilance, haste
mc.printedText: Vigilance, haste
mc.flavorText: The unit of measurement used to chart a cerodon's growth is "persons consumed."

mc.name: Jenara, Asura of War
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{1}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Jenara, Asura of War.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{1}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Jenara, Asura of War.
mc.flavorText: Wounded soldiers looked up, grateful for her appearance. But she passed over them, her eyes firmly on their foe.

mc.name: Leonin Armorguard
mc.oracleText: When Leonin Armorguard comes into play, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: When Leonin Armorguard comes into play, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Well suited are the nacatl to a coat of steel and forge-tempered claws.

mc.name: Sen Triplets
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose target opponent. This turn, that player can't play spells or activated abilities and plays with his or her hand revealed. You may play cards from that player's hand this turn.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose target opponent. This turn, that player can't play spells or activated abilities and plays with his or her hand revealed. You can play cards from that player's hand this turn.
mc.flavorText: They are the masters of your mind.

mc.name: Aven Mimeomancer
mc.oracleText:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a feather counter on target creature. If you do, that creature is 3/1 and has flying as long as it has a feather counter on it.
mc.printedText:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a feather counter on target creature. If you do, that creature is 3/1 and has flying as long as it has a feather counter on it.
mc.flavorText: "If the skies are our only refuge, I will see all of us take wing."

mc.name: Finest Hour
mc.oracleText:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, if it's the first combat phase of the turn, untap that creature. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
mc.printedText:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, if it's the first combat phase of the turn, untap that creature. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

mc.name: Spellbound Dragon
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Spellbound Dragon attacks, draw a card, then discard a card. Spellbound Dragon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the discarded card's converted mana cost.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Spellbound Dragon attacks, draw a card, then discard a card. Spellbound Dragon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the discarded card's converted mana cost.
mc.flavorText: A king in Jund, a serf in Esper.

mc.name: Lavalanche
mc.oracleText: Lavalanche deals X damage to target player and each creature he or she controls.
mc.printedText: Lavalanche deals X damage to target player and each creature he or she controls.
mc.flavorText: Alara's burning blood cannot be contained by mere earth and stone.

mc.name: Maelstrom Pulse
mc.oracleText: Destroy target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent.
mc.printedText: Destroy target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent.
mc.flavorText: During the collision of the shards, entire ways of life disappeared without a trace.

mc.name: Dauntless Escort
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Dauntless Escort: Creatures you control are indestructible this turn.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Dauntless Escort: Creatures you control are indestructible this turn.
mc.flavorText: Elspeth's squires do not seek advancement. For them, no knightly glory could surpass the glory of serving their champion.

mc.name: Dragon Appeasement
mc.oracleText:
Skip your draw step.
Whenever you sacrifice a creature, you may draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Skip your draw step.
Whenever you sacrifice a creature, you may draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"Look there--they carry that one upon a sedan chair. It must be their leader. Wait . . . Oh! Perhaps not."
--Kaeda, aven scout

mc.name: Lightning Reaver
mc.oracleText:
Fear, haste
Whenever Lightning Reaver deals combat damage to a player, put a charge counter on it.
At the end of your turn, Lightning Reaver deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to each opponent.
mc.printedText:
Fear, haste
Whenever Lightning Reaver deals combat damage to a player, put a charge counter on it.
At the end of your turn, Lightning Reaver deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to each opponent.

mc.name: Tainted Sigil
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Tainted Sigil: You gain life equal to the total life lost by all players this turn. (Damage causes loss of life.)
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Tainted Sigil: You gain life equal to the total life lost by all players this turn. (Damage causes loss of life.)
mc.flavorText: Sigils corrupted by outsiders do not lose their power, only their purity.

mc.name: Vedalken Heretic
mc.oracleText: Whenever Vedalken Heretic deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.
mc.printedText: Whenever Vedalken Heretic deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.
mc.flavorText: "Etherium clouded my eyes, clogged my ears, desensitized my skin. Now that I can feel, I can begin to learn."

mc.name: Mayael's Aria
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control if you control a creature with power 5 or greater. Then you gain 10 life if you control a creature with power 10 or greater. Then you win the game if you control a creature with power 20 or greater.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control if you control a creature with power 5 or greater. Then you gain 10 life if you control a creature with power 10 or greater. Then you win the game if you control a creature with power 20 or greater.

mc.name: Deathbringer Thoctar
mc.oracleText:
Whenever another creature is put into a graveyard from play, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Deathbringer Thoctar.
Remove a +1/+1 counter from Deathbringer Thoctar: Deathbringer Thoctar deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

Whenever another creature is put into a graveyard from play, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Deathbringer Thoctar.

mc.name: Knotvine Paladin
mc.oracleText: Whenever Knotvine Paladin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each untapped creature you control.
mc.printedText: Whenever Knotvine Paladin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each untapped creature you control.
mc.flavorText:
"He is part of a new breed of guardian, one who embraces the best of both his world and ours."
--Mayael the Anima

mc.name: Madrush Cyclops
mc.oracleText: Creatures you control have haste.
mc.printedText: Creatures you control have haste.
mc.flavorText: Death comes in the blink of an eye.

mc.printedText: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}. You gain 4 life.
mc.flavorText:
"His body belongs to Bant now. His soul? I honestly don't know. I expect it belongs to the angels."
--Rafiq of the Many

mc.name: Soul Manipulation
mc.oracleText: Choose one or both- Counter target creature spell; and/or return target creature card in your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: Choose one or both -- Counter target creature spell; and/or return target creature card in your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText:
"Birth and death are both reversible."
--Nicol Bolas

mc.name: Vedalken Ghoul
mc.oracleText: Whenever Vedalken Ghoul becomes blocked, defending player loses 4 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever Vedalken Ghoul becomes blocked, defending player loses 4 life.
mc.flavorText: For four nights following Ennor's death and the reclaiming of his etherium, its recipients were found slain, the etherium ripped from their bodies.

mc.flavorText:

mc.printedText: Whenever a creature with power 5 or greater comes into play under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Godtracker of Jund.

mc.printedText: Whenever Nemesis of Reason attacks, defending player puts the top ten cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

Flying

mc.printedText:
Flying
When Filigree Angel comes into play, you gain 3 life for each artifact you control.
mc.flavorText: "I craved enlightenment, and Crucius's etherium opened my eyes. I would share my sight with you, but first you must believe."

mc.printedText: As long as you control another multicolored permanent, Esper Stormblade gets +1/+1 and has flying.
mc.flavorText: Stormcallers came to appreciate the novelty of Jund's volcanic updrafts.

mc.printedText: Gain control of target creature. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Nicol Bolas doesn't distinguish between servants and victims.

mc.printedText: As long as you control another multicolored permanent, Jund Hackblade gets +1/+1 and has haste.

mc.oracleText: Flying, first strike, vigilance, lifelink, protection from red and from green
mc.printedText: Flying, first strike, vigilance, lifelink, protection from red and from green
mc.flavorText: No one has properly answered her favorite riddle: "Why should I spare your life?"

mc.name: Knight of New Alara
mc.oracleText: Each other multicolored creature you control gets +1/+1 for each of its colors.
mc.printedText: Each other multicolored creature you control gets +1/+1 for each of its colors.
mc.flavorText: "I embrace all of Alara, Grixis as much as Bant. Let my former home call me traitor. I do this not for accolades, but because it is right."

Flying
When Messenger Falcons comes into play, draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Messenger Falcons comes into play, draw a card.
mc.flavorText: So many aven had died scouting the distant fronts that the knight-captains recruited Nayan falcons as couriers.

mc.name: Uril, the Miststalker
mc.oracleText:
Uril, the Miststalker can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.
Uril gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it.
mc.printedText:
Uril, the Miststalker can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.
Uril gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it.
mc.flavorText: It strides through the whitecover, mists in which even gargantuans can hide.

mc.name: Defiler of Souls
mc.oracleText:
Flying
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a monocolored creature.
mc.printedText:
Flying
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a monocolored creature.
mc.flavorText:
"Stray not into sin, lest you face the doorman of an insatiable tomb."
--Prayer of Asha

mc.name: Grizzled Leotau
mc.flavorText:
"There is no glory in a death of age, as even the leotau know. As winter steals into their coats, they seek the deadliest lands, that they may die as they lived."
--Aarsil the Blessed

mc.name: Dragon Broodmother
mc.oracleText:
Flying
At the beginning of each upkeep, put a 1/1 red and green Dragon creature token with flying and devour 2 into play. (As the token comes into play, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. It comes into play with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
mc.printedText:
Flying
At the beginning of each upkeep, put a 1/1 red and green Dragon creature token with flying and devour 2 into play. (As the token comes into play, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. It comes into play with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.)

mc.name: Time Sieve
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice five artifacts: Take an extra turn after this one.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice five artifacts: Take an extra turn after this one.
mc.flavorText:
"I pray that I am never considered useless or old."
--Sharuum the Hegemon

mc.name: Rhox Brute
mc.flavorText:
"In this new world, I have seen the once-devout rhoxes take up arms with the savages of Jund. I would be offended, but I see the wisdom in their choice."
--Gernan, Dawnray archer

mc.name: Unscythe, Killer of Kings
mc.oracleText:
Equipped creature gets +3/+3 and has first strike.
Whenever a creature dealt damage by equipped creature this turn is put into a graveyard, you may remove that card from the game. If you do, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token into play.
Equip {2}

mc.name: Arsenal Thresher
mc.oracleText: As Arsenal Thresher comes into play, you may reveal any number of other artifact cards from your hand. Arsenal Thresher comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it for each card revealed this way.
mc.printedText: As Arsenal Thresher comes into play, you may reveal any number of other artifact cards from your hand. Arsenal Thresher comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it for each card revealed this way.

mc.name: Cloven Casting
mc.oracleText: Whenever you play a multicolored instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
mc.printedText: Whenever you play a multicolored instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
mc.flavorText: "Let us flee to the deep jungle. Our city is no longer safe--and I suspect neither is the fallback retreat."

mc.name: Gloryscale Viashino
mc.oracleText: Whenever you play a multicolored spell, Gloryscale Viashino gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever you play a multicolored spell, Gloryscale Viashino gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"This is a new world and a new war. We need warriors who know chaos and how to combat it."
--Lisha of the Azure
